Emerging growth company &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section 13(a) of the Exchange Act. &#9744; &#160; &#160; &#160; Item&#160;2.02 Results of Operations and Financial Condition. On May&#160;26, 2022, Broadcom Inc. (the &#8220;Company&#8221;) issued a press release announcing its unaudited financial results for the second fiscal quarter ended May&#160;1, 2022. A copy of the press release is attached hereto as Exhibit 99.1 and is incorporated herein by reference. The information in Item 2.02 of this Report and the press release attached hereto as Exhibit 99.1 are furnished and shall not be treated as filed for purposes of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended. &#160; Item&#160;8.01 Other Events. On May&#160;26, 2022, the Company announced that the Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend on the Company&#8217;s 8.00% Mandatory Convertible Preferred Stock, Series A (the &#8220;Mandatory Convertible Preferred Stock&#8221;), of $20.00 per share. This dividend is payable on June&#160;30, 2022 to Mandatory Convertible Preferred Stock holders of record at the close of business (5:00 p.m., Eastern Time) on June&#160;15, 2022. The Company also announced that the Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend on the Company&#8217;s common stock of $4.10 per share. This dividend is payable on June&#160;30, 2022 to common stockholders of record at the close of business (5:00 p.m., Eastern Time) on June&#160;22, 2022. &#160; Item&#160;9.01 Financial Statements and Exhibits. (d) Exhibits &#160; Exhibit&#160;No. &#160;&#160; Description 99.1 &#160;&#160; Press release issued by Broadcom Inc. dated May&#160;26, 2022 104 &#160;&#160; Cover Page Interactive Data File (formatted as Inline XBRL).
